Section.Catchline: Enforcement of specified insurance provisions; adoption of rules.

SectionBody.Text: The office may enforce, with respect to group self-insurance funds established or operated under s. 624.4621, the provisions of s. 624.316, s. 624.424, s. 625.091, or s. 625.305 as they relate to workers’ compensation insurers, and the commission may adopt rules to implement the enforcement authority granted by this section.
